monumentInformation.title: Charbagh Garden
details: A stunning Persian-style garden symbolizing paradise, with four equal sections reflecting Mughal symmetry.

monumentInformation.title: The Jawab
details: The Jawab is a red sandstone mosque complementing the main mausoleum, designed for prayer.

monumentInformation.title: Taj Mahal - Mausoleum
details: A masterpiece of Mughal architecture blending Persian, Indian, and Islamic styles, crowned by a grand white marble dome.

monumentInformation.title: Yamuna River
details: The serene Yamuna River flows gracefully behind the Taj, enhancing its tranquility and mirroring its beauty.

monumentInformation.title: The Mihman Khana
details: The Mihman Khana is a guesthouse matching the mosque, built to maintain visual balance and symmetry.
